entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 a.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 9:00 AM CDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Blizzard developing overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
